document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy of the weevil genus Plumolepilius Barrios-Izás & Anderson (Coleoptera Curculionidae: Molytinae: Conotrachelini): new species from Central America

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomy of the weevil genus Plumolepilius Barrios-Izás & Anderson (Coleoptera Curculionidae: Molytinae: Conotrachelini): new species from Central America

subSubSection.paragraph: Derivation of the specific name. Patronym, named after my dear brother Leonel Antonio Barrios Izás, an agronomist in Guatemala , as gift for his support to the author during the preparation of this paper.

Material examined: 95♂♂ 73♀♀ ( ASUCOB , BMNH , CMNC , EAPZ , USNM ). Holotype ♂ ( CMNC ): HONDURAS : Olancho , La Muralla N.P., 14km N. La Union, 1450m , 25.VI.1994 -130, R. Anderson, mont.wet evergr. for.litt. / Holotype ♂
Plumolepilius antonioi Barrios-Izás
sp. nov. Aedeagus extracted. Paratypes : same data as holotype ( 1♂ 1♀ , ASUCOB , 1♂ 1♀ , BMNH, 7♂♂ 7♀♀ CMNC, 1♂ 1♀ , EAPZ,, 1♂ 1♀ , USNM ). Same data except for 16-17.VIII.1994 -207 mont.wet evergr. for.litt. berl. ( 12♂♂ 5♀♀ , 1♂ 1♀ , ASUCOB, 1♂ 1♀ , BMNH, 9♂♂ 2♀♀ CMNC, 1♂ 1♀ , USNM ). HONDURAS : Olancho , P.N. La Muralla, 14km N. La Union, 1510- 1550m , 16-17.VIII.1994 -209, R. Anderson, transition cloud for.litt. berl. ( 2♂♂ 2♀♀ , CMNC ). Same data ex- cept for 1430m , 16-17.VIII.1994 -208, liquidambar/oak for. litt. berl. ( 12♂♂ 13♀♀ , CMNC ; 2♂♂ 2♀♀ , ICZ ). Same data except for 1450-1500m , 16-17.VIII.1994 -206, montane wet evergreen forest, beating ( 4♂♂ 6♀♀ , 1♂ 1♀ ASUCOB ). HONDURAS : Olancho , La Muralla NP, 14km N. La Union, 1350m , 1.IX.1994 -209, S.&J. Peck, montane forest litter, 94-70 ( 5♂♂ ). HONDURAS : Olancho , P.N. La Muralla, 8.3km NNW La Unión,

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 13–18.
Plumolepilius antonioi
. Male. 13, Dorsal habitus. 14, Lateral habitus. 15, Frontal view. 16, Abdominal ventrites I–V. 17, Aedeagus dorsal view. 18, Aedeagus lateral view.

subSubSection.paragraph: 1460m , 15.09723°N , 86.73842°W , 4 Oct 2008 , M.G. Branstetter, mesic forest, MGB1131 ( 3♂♂ 3♀♀ , CMNC ). Same data except for 8.9km NNW La Union, 1530m , 15.10123°N , 86.74527°W , MGB-1133 ( 1♀ , CMNC ). Same data except for 8.4km NNW La Union, 15.09862°N , 86.73526°W , MGB-1136 ( 2♂♂ 1♀ , CMNC ). La Union, 1450m , 17.VIII.1994 , S. Peck, 94-39, wet mont.for.litter. ( 2♂♂ 6♀♀ , CMNC ).
